page.title: 12Interviewing Campers
page.content: At the campsite at the top end of Budnic Estate we found some people to interview.They were holiday makers. Some came from foreign countries.They all said they liked Perranporth because it was interesting and it has a beach .We interviewed three people. We interviewed a lady who said,"I not speak English!"So we went to a man. We said, "Are you a visitor to Perranporth?" He replied, "Yes!" A girl came from Crawley near London. Two other men came from Hampshire and a man came from Leicester. The campsite was only half full and quite empty at that time of the day which was midday. The interviewed holiday makers all agreed that Perranporth was interesting and not too expensive. Most had tents though some had caravans or dormobiles.They all hoped for good weather.
